Key Arguments: The legislation represents government overreach and lacks clear definitions for misinformation and disinformation.
Freedom of speech is fundamental to democracy and technological advancement.
Government control over opinions could lead to a totalitarian dictatorship.
The government's handling of Covid-19 is cited as an example of the dangers of controlling narratives.
The author claims personal financial loss due to being accused of spreading misinformation.
Notable Quotes: Freedom of speech is the foundation of our entire society.
Allowing a government to restrict what opinions can be aired in a free society is a prerequisite to setting up a totalitarian dictatorship.
The idea that the Government can determine what truth is should send a chill down the spine of anyone with a functioning brain.
